description:
Brittany Snow (X, Pitch Perfect) joins Justin in the Wondery studio to discuss what it was like to star in the new horror movie, X, and why singing causes her a ton of anxiety. Plus she tells us about the time Ellen forced her to perform her favorite karaoke song on her show.
